clues.text: A genus of frogs is called this type, presumably because they croak in unison like a group of actors speaking together in a play

rounds.category: FROM THE NEW TESTAMENT TO THE MAP

clues.text: This Vatican basilica is one of the largest churches in the world with a capacity of 60,000
